comments.text:
1. Enable http://www.youtube.com/html5
2. Load http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kmk43_2dtn0
3. Do the following in quick succession:
  a. Move the cursor to the full-screen button.
  b. Click.
4. Avoid moving the cursor for the next second. (Easier with a trackpad?)

Result:
  An "Exit full screen" tooltip appears, covering part of the full-screen video :(

I guess Firefox is confused about what I'm hovering.
